worldedit.title: WorldEdit
worldedit.description: A Minecraft Map Editor... that runs in-game! With selections, schematics, copy and paste, brushes, and scripting.

fantasy.title: Fantasy
fantasy.description: Library to support creating dimensions at runtime.

DisguiseLib.title: DisguiseLib
DisguiseLib.description: A (server-side) library for disguising entities in Minecraft.

stimuli.title: Stimuli
stimuli.description: Library for working server-side events with the ability to filter by event source.

HologramAPI.title: HologramAPI
HologramAPI.description: Simple API for creation of server side holograms without entities.

SidebarAPI.title: Sidebar API
SidebarAPI.description: Simple API for Fabric server side sidebar (scoreboard)
